validation_invalidOnlySaudiId: Only Saudi national ID is allowed
validation_emailPattern: Invalid email format. Correct format: example@domain.com
validation_mobileNationalPattern: Invalid mobile number (max 17 digits). Must start with 00. Example: 00XXXXXXXX
validation_invalidUnifiedNumber: Invalid unified number. Must be 10 digits starting with 7 (e.g., 7xxxxxxxxx)
validation_specialCharPattern: Invalid characters. Special characters like ~!@#$%^&*()_+<>?/ are not allowed
validation_invalidCRNumber: Invalid Commercial Registration number. Must be 10 digits starting with 1 (e.g., 1xxxxxxxxx)
validation_agreedToTermsRequired: You must accept the data accuracy declaration to proceed
validation_lengthRange: Length must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
validation_invalidBirthDate: Birth date cannot be in the future
validation_ageAbove: You must be at least {{age}} years old
